General.Name: Shandong Intco Recycling Resources Co Ltd
General.Description: Shandong Intco Recycling Resources Co., Ltd. recycles, regenerates, and utilizes renewable plastics in China. Its product portfolio includes regenerated PS particles, plastic volume reduction equipment, and recycled PET products, as well as offers environmental picture frame lines and finished product boxes. The company was founded in 2005 and is based in Zibo, China.
General.Address: Qilu Chemical Industrial Park, Zibo, China, 255414
